item.title: Hello World, Hello Android!
item.author: fractalwrench@gmail.com (Jamie Lynch)
item.description: Hello World, Hello Hugo, and Hello Android! This website originally started off as a portfolio site with some hacked together HTML. Over time, as I developed more Android applications, that workflow got a bit too complex. Therefore, I’ve moved the entire site over to the Hugo static site generator for the foreseeable future, which makes things a lot easier. The original focus of the site was just a portfolio displaying Android, iOS, and other mobile projects which I’d completed during my time in the Bath/Bristol area.
